reviews.text: Great food and the people there are even greater! Excellent customer service, super clean and the decor is pretty. The tacos are amazing!
Since the opening of this location, I have eaten here countless times. Every time, the food is spot on. Everything is made fresh everyday, and the flavor is amazing. I highly recommend this place

I came across this place on Ogden Avenue. There is a limited selection of food in this area, so this was the best find! The people working here are so welcoming and the food is just so delicious .wow..

My bro Ivan brought me and my girl here. We live right down the block from it, and its fantastic, from the food to the service. Their Birria tacos are amazing, and so are their Tortas. Hit this place, oh, and definitely get their horchata!!! Show them some love if you are around the area
i‚Äôve tried a lot of mexican places in the bronx and this is probably the best one in a 4 mile radius.
If you want some delicious AUTHENTIC Mexican food then please come here. The food is fresh & flavorful you would not be disappointed. Truly what our neighborhood needed love it here so much
My favorite taquitos. Great service by Gabriel and the Fam. Truly authentic Mexican food made with love
Great Mexican food and unbelievable breakfast & horchata!
Amazing Fresh Food, 10/10 would recommend if you want Mexican Food
Love this place, everything that they prepare is always good. 10/10 ‚ú®üëåüèº
